steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a high-temperature crucible.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 25 째C or 77 째F).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 25 째C or 77 째F).

steps: 1. Carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible once cooled.
